page.title: 12LOCAL AMENITIES AND USERS
page.content: Within the area surveyed there are only two important amenities. 1. two adjacent golf courses 2. A portion of Royal Bushy Park Most of the visitors we interviewed stay for over 30 mins and go to the park every day, usually by walking or cycling and take over 30 mins to reach it. All thought facilities were good but suggestions for improvements included more toilets drinking fountains litter bins and more staff. Of the golf clubs one is is a first class private championship course. The second is municipal owned.Most golfers play regularly, several daily. Most players arrived by car, only one by train. Facilities were rated excellent, but suggested improvements were better bunkers, course lock up at night,better clubhouse and greens. THE MALL SCHOOL
